ABOUT
MEETINGS
Meetings
Join our open meetings to learn what the core team and contributirs are up to and to volunteer yous contributions. The meeting is open to all OWASP members and non-members, however we do encourage membership.
You can also check out out past meetings on YouTube, or if you are on the move join our Pandora podcast.
Open Meeting
Bi-Weekly
WED
Time: 09:00am
Time Zone: PST
Video call link:
Join Zoom Meeting
Add to
Google Calendar
Add to
Outlook Calendar (ics)
